description.narrative: Output 2.1: By 2018, health facilities offer adequate, integrated services to adolescents at risk of HIV infection PMTCT for pregnant women and exposed newborns and case management for children and adolescents infected with HIV, which contributes to Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Protect, Care And Support Children And Families Affected By Hiv, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: Pregnant women, adolescents and children have access to and make greater use of quality preventive and curative care services for an AIDS-free generation.

sector.narrative: HIV testing including self testing and counselling in adolescents

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.1: By 2018, health facilities offer adequate, integrated services to adolescents at risk of HIV infection; PMTCT for pregnant women and exposed newborns; and case management for children and adolescents infected with HIV

description.narrative: In the health districts of convergence municipalities more than 70% of pregnant women seen during the first Ante Natal Consultation received an interpersonal counselling on PMTCT and about the same number accessed the HIV testing. 72 per cent of HIV-positive pregnant women are receiving antiretroviral three therapy. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019

title.narrative: % of CSIs in convergence municipalities having introduced the PMTCT Option B
% of adolescents / youth (15-24 years of age) who have undergone a voluntary HIV test in the convergence municipalities
% of children born to seropositive mothers benefiting from ARV prophylaxis and cotrimoxazole at CSIs in convergence municipalities
% of pregnant women tested for HIV during ANC in CSIs in convergence municipalities
% of seropositive pregnant women benefiting from PMTCT prophylaxis or ARV treatment in CSIs of convergence municipalities
% of children born to seropositive mothers benefiting from early diagnosis at CSIs in convergence municipalities
Comprehensive behaviour change communication strategy for adolescents and youth including those from key populations available
Existence of age- and sex-disaggregated data on HIV testing and counselling among adolescents 15 -19 years and by sex
National child protection strategy or a national social protection strategy that includes elements focused on HIV available
Existence of a national HIV and AIDS Prevention, PMTCT, Treatment and Care Strategy
Existence of national household survey based data on HIV disaggregated by age and sex collected within the preceding 5 years

National HIV Strategic plan/guidance for care and treatment that are aligned to Global targets and the most recent WHO recommendations for care and treatment of children , adolescents and pregnant/breast feeding women
